content: WASHINGTON  Sept 27 The U.S. Senate voted on Wednesday to confirm the head of the Justice Department's Antitrust Division  which will decide the fate of deals like AT&T Inc's proposed purchase of Time Warner Inc and the merger of Bayer AG and Monsanto Co.
name: EchoStar Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. Senate votes to confirm Trump officials for antitrust  CFIUS
